warmups.name: Glute Bridge
cues: Heels under the knees
Lift tailbone until lax contraction, pause
Turn on the muscles at the top
Turn off the muscles on the bottom

warmups.name: Windshield Wipers
cues: Lay on back
Bring knees down to the left
Then bring them back to the right.
Even breath

warmups.name: Thighs
cues: Squeeze knees and ankles together throughout
Push top knee towards the floor
Press both shoulder blades into the floor
Breathe out on the down in on the up

warmups.name: Plank
cues: elbows directly under shoulders
feet shoulder width apart
belly button stays above the shoulders
relax the hands
keep the breathe flowing, contract but breathe

warmups.name: Right Side Plank
cues: Feet on top of each other
Elbow directly under the shoulder
Shoulder, hip, knee, ankle all in straight line

warmups.name: Left Side Plank
cues: feet on top of each other
elbow directly under the shoulder
shoulder, hip, knee, ankle all in straight line

exercises.name: Split Squats Right
cues: Keep knee above the heel during both phases
Shoulders and hips go up and down together
Avoid the urge to bring the torso forward
Shoulders and sit-bones drop straight to the floor
Breath in on the down out on the up
Fight gravity in both directions

exercises.name: Twist Crunch
cues: Raise right ankle straight leg, perpendicular to the floor
Think about using the belly muscles to raise the leg
Lift and twist the torso as if your left shoulder were to touch your right knee.
Breath in on the down and out at the top
Fight gravity in both directions

exercises.name: Split Squats Left
cues: Keep knee above the heel during both phases
Shoulders and hips go up and down together
Avoid the urge to bring the torso forward
Shoulders and sit-bones drop straight to the floor
Breath in on the down out on the up
Fight gravity in both directions

exercises.name: Superman
cues: Thumbs up to the sky at all times
Arms out like a Y at the top, bending the body in half backwards
Hold squeeze for a beat
Breath in on the down and out at the top
Fight gravity in both directions

exercises.name: Leg Curls
cues: Curl your legs
Curl them again
Down and up

exercises.name: Plank
cues: elbows directly under shoulders
feet shoulder width apart
belly button stays above the shoulders
relax the hands
keep the breathe flowing, contract but breathe

exercises.name: Jack Knife Crunch Left Side
cues: Right elbow on the floor
Diagonal crunch touch elbow to side of the knee
Squeeze knees and ankles together
Turn on the muscles at the top turn off the muscles on the bottom
Breathe in at the bottom out at the top

exercises.name: Jack Knife Crunch Right Side
cues: Left elbow on the floor
Diagonal crunch touch elbow to side of the knee
Squeeze knees and ankles together
Turn on the muscles at the top turn off the muscles on the bottom
Breathe in at the bottom out at the top

exercises.name: Flamingos Right
cues: Right arm up, right leg up
Right knee bent 90 degrees
Heel directly below the knee
Right shoulder and right heel move together
Breathe in on the way down out on the way up

exercises.name: Flamingos Left
cues: Left arm up, right leg up
Left knee bent 90 degrees
Heel directly below the knee
Left shoulder and right heel move together
Breathe in on the way down out on the way up

stretches.name: Left Hamstring Stretch
cues: Grab middle of leg
Bring knee as close as possible to your arm pit and hold
Straighten leg heel first towards the sky

stretches.name: Right Hamstring Stretch
cues: Grab middle of leg
Bring knee as close as possible to your arm pit and hold
Straighten leg heel first towards the sky

stretches.name: Left Quad Stretch
cues: Grab ankle, keep foot loose
Heel stays in contact with the glute
Right shoulder towards floor at the same rate as right knee back
Keep heel on glute

stretches.name: Right Quad Stretch
cues: Grab ankle, keep foot loose
Heel stays in contact with the glute
Right shoulder towards floor at the same rate as right knee back
Keep heel on glute

stretches.name: Right Psoas Stretch
cues: Right knee behind hip
Left heel in front of Left knee
Left forearm on Left thigh
Shoulders stay in the same plane as the hips
Right arm parallel to the floor

stretches.name: Left Psoas Stretch
cues: Left knee behind hip
Right heel in front of Left knee
Right forearm on Left thigh
Shoulders stay in the same plane as the hips
Right arm parallel to the floor

stretches.name: Left Groin Stretch
cues: Push heel into the floor and wall simultaneously
Drop hand below the knee and put weight into it
Stretch to reach opposite arm parallel to the floor

stretches.name: Right Groin Stretch
cues: Push heel into the floor and wall simultaneously
Drop hand below the knee and put weight into it
Stretch to reach opposite arm parallel to the floor

stretches.name: Left Shoulder Stretch
cues: Grab upper arm near shoulder
Pull left arm to
Keep hips and shoulders in same plane
Keep body weight in left leg bot both feet flat on floor
Breathe in at the top, out as you bend down

stretches.name: Right Shoulder Stretch
cues: Grab upper arm near shoulder
Pull right arm to
Keep hips and shoulders in same plane
Keep body weight in right leg bot both feet flat on floor
Breathe in at the top, out as you bend down
